name: Asura's Trial
description:
Learn new skills based on simple key combinations in this easy to learn, hard to master adventure RPG. Chain over 100 different skills from 5 diverse classes to create an unbeatable combination and reclaim your body by finishing Asura's Trial.

You were once a noble adventurer until your body was taken over by a demon. You wake inside the mind of the demon Asura, trapped together with all the other
souls the demon has consumed over the ages. It's your goal to recover your body, slaying the lost souls within the demon's mind, gaining the skills they had in life and finally slaying the demon Asura.

Features:
  • Unlock over a hundred skills made from simple key combination which you can chain for devastating effects
  • Develop a unique character each run by raising your stats and drafting a unique skillset
  • Cute 2d graphics
  • Unique enemies within each encounter

Asura's Trial comes with:

  • 3 levels each with their unique encounters and atmosphere
  • 100+ unlockable skills
  • 3 different starting characters

P.S I developed this game as a solo developer, to bring to life something which I believe would be cute and cool.
